title: Bug 124610: Adding a filter on a boolean computed column causes an error.
description: When attempting to add a filter on a boolean computed column, an error occurs.
OB: When trying to apply a filter to a boolean computed column, the system throws an error.
EB: Filters should be successfully applied to boolean computed columns without triggering errors.
SR:
1. Navigate to the table with a boolean computed column.
2. Attempt to add a filter to the boolean computed column.
3. Observe the error that occurs.
